description: Lists all the transaction events for an address on the blockchain.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: The blockchain network where the transaction occurred. Valid Values: BITCOIN_MAINNET | BITCOIN_TESTNET.

parameters.name: addressIdentifierFilter
parameters.description: This is the unique public address on the blockchain for which the transaction events are being requested. The container for the recipient address of the transaction. (string) ---

nested_params.name: transactionEventToAddress
nested_params.description: The container for the recipient address of the transaction.

parameters.name: timeFilter
parameters.description: This container specifies the time frame for the transaction events returned in the response. from (dict) --- The container for time. time (datetime) --- The container of the Timestamp of the blockchain instant. to (dict) --- The container for time. time (datetime) --- The container of the Timestamp of the blockchain instant.

nested_params.name: time
nested_params.description: The container of the Timestamp of the blockchain instant.

nested_params.name: time
nested_params.description: The container of the Timestamp of the blockchain instant.

parameters.name: voutFilter
parameters.description: This container specifies filtering attributes related to BITCOIN_VOUT event types Specifies if the transaction output is spent or unspent.

nested_params.name: voutSpent
nested_params.description: Specifies if the transaction output is spent or unspent.

parameters.name: confirmationStatusFilter
parameters.description: The container for the ConfirmationStatusFilter that filters for the finality of the results. The container to determine whether to list results that have only reached finality. Transactions that have reached finality are always part of the response. (string) ---

nested_params.name: include
nested_params.description: The container to determine whether to list results that have only reached finality. Transactions that have reached finality are always part of the response.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The order by which the results will be sorted. sortBy (string) --- Container on how the results will be sorted by? sortOrder (string) --- The container for the sort order for ListFilteredTransactionEvents. The SortOrder field only accepts the values ASCENDING and DESCENDING. Not providing SortOrder will default to ASCENDING.

nested_params.name: sortBy
nested_params.description: Container on how the results will be sorted by?

nested_params.name: sortOrder
nested_params.description: The container for the sort order for ListFilteredTransactionEvents. The SortOrder field only accepts the values ASCENDING and DESCENDING. Not providing SortOrder will default to ASCENDING.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of transaction events to list. Default: 100

nested_items.name: events
nested_items.description: The transaction events returned by the request.

nested_items.name: network
nested_items.description: The blockchain network where the transaction occurred.

nested_items.name: transactionHash
nested_items.description: The hash of a transaction. It is generated when a transaction is created.

nested_items.name: from
nested_items.description: The wallet address initiating the transaction. It can either be a public key or a contract.

nested_items.name: to
nested_items.description: The wallet address receiving the transaction. It can either be a public key or a contract.

nested_items.name: contractAddress
nested_items.description: The blockchain address for the contract.

nested_items.name: tokenId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the token involved in the transaction.

nested_items.name: transactionId
nested_items.description: The identifier of a Bitcoin transaction. It is generated when a transaction is created.

nested_items.name: voutIndex
nested_items.description: The position of the transaction output in the transaction output list.

nested_items.name: voutSpent
nested_items.description: Specifies if the transaction output is spent or unspent. This is only returned for BITCOIN_VOUT event types.

nested_items.name: spentVoutTransactionId
nested_items.description: The transactionId that created the spent transaction output.

nested_items.name: spentVoutTransactionHash
nested_items.description: The transactionHash that created the spent transaction output.

nested_items.name: spentVoutIndex
nested_items.description: The position of the spent transaction output in the output list of the creating transaction.

nested_items.name: time
nested_items.description: The container of the Timestamp of the blockchain instant.

nested_items.name: confirmationStatus
nested_items.description: This container specifies whether the transaction has reached Finality.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that indicates the next set of results to retrieve.
